name: Bewitchment
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

It's hard to study and solve magical crimes, but here you are, doing that!

Bewitchment is a point-and-click mystery game where you play as Jaya, a student of magical arts, that wants to become a detective. Given your good grades and interest, you are asked to help with a problem found in the Director's office.

(has a bunch of portraits and names wrong. I will sit down and correct them once we pick up this project again!)

For convenience, some extra keys:

R - Restarts the scene

T - Goes to the menu

One of our second year projects. 

Team:

Débora Moreira artstation.com/deborafm - Character Models, Writing, Programming, 2D Art Assets, Concept

Rita Duarte artstation.com/ritaduarte - 3D Enviorment Objects, Concept 

Mariana Terremoto  artstation.com/mmpt - 3D Enviorment Objects, Concept, Menu

Music by Kevin Macleod
